channel.title: No mods are working
channel.description: Hello, I try several things but no mods are working Experimental or Early access (v151248) I try to use Satisfactory Mod Manager v2.4.3. The mods are installed in the folder but I can't see any of them in the game. In the game I cannot see anymore the mods menu Any idea or help?

item.title: No mods are working
item.dc:creator: @Degenerecy Degenerecy
item.description:
@Degenerecy wrote:

A few do/have been updated. You will have to start a new profile and reinstall working ones and then goto the compatible section and not all. SMART just got updated, refined power still broken :{

Read full topic
